cases.title: Creating a limit order WPOL & USDT
cases.description: Creating a limit order WPOL & USDT on Polygon network
cases.preconditions:
1inch wallet connected.
Balance: 74 Polygon, 10 WPOL.
Polygon network.

steps.action: Open Page limit orders on Polygon network
steps.expected_result:
Limit order page on the Polygon network with the WPOL & USDT currency pair, with a connected wallet with a balance of 74 POL. The number of WPOL in the “You pay” field is 1.
![image.png](https://d2cxucsjd6xvsd.cloudfront.net/public/team/b50ac8e133663944768bd8fc2da17e5374f3a6e3/attachment/2c4bbf4ffab7f397528a6e8ba8b17d02a435fab1/image.png)

steps.action: In the WPOL field, enter the value 10.
steps.expected_result:
The value 10 appeared in the WPOL field.
![image.png](https://d2cxucsjd6xvsd.cloudfront.net/public/team/b50ac8e133663944768bd8fc2da17e5374f3a6e3/attachment/c061821d6beb960c5b511669f16de9f14b795ca9/image.png)

steps.action: Click on the "Review limit order" button
steps.expected_result:
The limit order verification window appears.
The initial token amount, destination token amount, and order validity period are displayed correctly.
![image.png](https://d2cxucsjd6xvsd.cloudfront.net/public/team/b50ac8e133663944768bd8fc2da17e5374f3a6e3/attachment/a59e31831c040002655211534582641bbf2d1af8/image.png)

Appear "Please, sign limit order in your wallet" module.
![image.png](https://d2cxucsjd6xvsd.cloudfront.net/public/team/b50ac8e133663944768bd8fc2da17e5374f3a6e3/attachment/2de6c73d33a1373c242cd5f26f9ca66d2f104ed2/image.png)
Sign limit page appear in wallet.

The initial token amount, destination token amount, and order validity period are displayed correctly in wallet.
Appear "Limit order submitted" module and close button.
![image.png](https://d2cxucsjd6xvsd.cloudfront.net/public/team/b50ac8e133663944768bd8fc2da17e5374f3a6e3/attachment/72df707e55c304e05b79331837c236b44114b5fd/image.png)

steps.action: Click on the button to close the window for placing an order.
steps.expected_result:
The order is displayed in the active orders tab.
Displays "Status", "Created/Expiration", "Order rates", "You pay" and "You recieve"
The initial token amount, destination token amount, and order validity period are displayed correctly.
![image.png](https://d2cxucsjd6xvsd.cloudfront.net/public/team/b50ac8e133663944768bd8fc2da17e5374f3a6e3/attachment/1dc7d96231accbc63d3bf54d9f10e61753c25c53/image.png)

cases.title: Cancel Active limit order
cases.preconditions:
Previously opened limit order for the WPOL & USDT currency pair
Polygon network
Page Limit orders

steps.action: Click on the red cross to close the order.
steps.expected_result:
The transaction confirmation window on a wallet with the date and time of the transaction, the destination currency and its amount, the sending currency and its amount, the wallet name and its abbreviated public key, the contract number, the hash, the network commission, and the nonce. Cancel and confirm buttons.
![image.png](https://d2cxucsjd6xvsd.cloudfront.net/public/team/b50ac8e133663944768bd8fc2da17e5374f3a6e3/attachment/0139edb6990640a36661c15fa9c016394816baca/image.png)

steps.action: Confirm a transaction on a wallet
steps.expected_result:
The “Transaction sent” window with the “View on PolygonScan” and “Close” buttons.
![image.png](https://d2cxucsjd6xvsd.cloudfront.net/public/team/b50ac8e133663944768bd8fc2da17e5374f3a6e3/attachment/9f10c648757452aa0047971be9c1650bdb47d7ff/image.png)

The order is displayed in the "Orders history' tab.
Displays "Status", "Created/Expiration", "Order rates", "You pay" and "You recieve"
The initial token amount, destination token amount, and order validity period are displayed correctly.
![image.png](https://d2cxucsjd6xvsd.cloudfront.net/public/team/b50ac8e133663944768bd8fc2da17e5374f3a6e3/attachment/42e26df17eadbd4126f471e55616d16d240d17a2/image.png)

cases.title: Connecting Metamask wallet on the limit orders page
cases.preconditions: The previously installed Metamask extension in the browser

steps.action: Click on the "Connect wallet" button below the limit order module.
steps.expected_result: Side menu with a list of wallets to connect. With the detected Metamask wallet.![image.png](https://d2cxucsjd6xvsd.cloudfront.net/public/team/b50ac8e133663944768bd8fc2da17e5374f3a6e3/attachment/11fd5b7daa913f0047f0c2b4b9cb3b7774677ef3/image.png)

The side menu “Select networks to connect” appears with two buttons: “EVM-based” and “Solana.”
![image.png](https://d2cxucsjd6xvsd.cloudfront.net/public/team/b50ac8e133663944768bd8fc2da17e5374f3a6e3/attachment/b1811f2b84d7f07de78140f972204e9b68660cfc/image.png)

Open the Metamask window confirmation of connection to the 1inch.io website, with the “Cancel” and “Connect” buttons. The window should contain the account number ,“Accounts” and ‘Permissions’ tabs, as well as the “Change Accounts” button.
![image.png](https://d2cxucsjd6xvsd.cloudfront.net/public/team/b50ac8e133663944768bd8fc2da17e5374f3a6e3/attachment/220cfedf5713baaf1e824b1717112fa41f88c59b/image.png)

steps.action: Click the Connect button in the Metamask window.
steps.expected_result:
The Metamask wallet is connecting.
![image.png](https://d2cxucsjd6xvsd.cloudfront.net/public/team/b50ac8e133663944768bd8fc2da17e5374f3a6e3/attachment/fc040a95565d860f547ad613ab5f53b7657ae735/image.png)
The Metamask window closes.
The shortened public key of the wallet is displayed at the top of the page.
![image.png](https://d2cxucsjd6xvsd.cloudfront.net/public/team/b50ac8e133663944768bd8fc2da17e5374f3a6e3/attachment/002c1206a7510be86bcaf7a2853b138e830e428c/image.png)
